PEOPLE BEHIND BEAM

CORE TEAM

Falk Benke, CEO

Falk is the resident German, whose obsessive attention to detail cannot be overstated. He’s a former IBMer, deeply curious about machine learning algorithms, and has a Masters with distinction in IT Systems Engineering from the Hasso Plattner Institute. If you run into Falk, ask him about that thing with the monkey at Busua Beach.

Gerald Pharin, CTO

Falk is the resident German, whose obsessive attention to detail cannot be overstated. He’s a former IBMer, deeply curious about machine learning algorithms, and has a Masters with distinction in IT Systems Engineering from the Hasso Plattner Institute. If you run into Falk, ask him about that thing with the monkey at Busua Beach.

Kingston Tagoe, CPO

Falk is the resident German, whose obsessive attention to detail cannot be overstated. He’s a former IBMer, deeply curious about machine learning algorithms, and has a Masters with distinction in IT Systems Engineering from the Hasso Plattner Institute. If you run into Falk, ask him about that thing with the monkey at Busua Beach.

ADVISORS & INVESTORS

Neal Hansch

Advisor

Neal has over fifteen years experience in venture capital, technology operations and investment banking. Most recently, he was a General Partner with Rustic Canyon Partners (RCP), an early-stage focused investment fund with $500MM under management. Neal does his best to disconnect from his digital devices by heading to the nearest body of water to enjoy some surfing, scuba diving, sailing or fishing.

Emmanuel Quartey

Marketing Advisor

Emmanuel is happiest when neck-deep in Photoshop files. He’s worked on the design and marketing teams of organizations both large and small, including SeeClickFix and the Yale Office of Public Affairs and Communications. He holds a BA in Architecture from Yale University, and can often be found reading or writing about comics, online communities, and the relationship between language and interfaces.

David Long

Legal Advisor

David is a San Francisco based, digital currency anti-money laundering attorney specializing in addressing the specific, AML compliance and fraud prevention challenges facing companies operating in that environment. His deep experience leverages his expertise in AML, fraud investigations, legal services, enforcement, business, education and training.

Meltwater Foundation

Investor

The Meltwater Entrepreneurial School of Technology (MEST) and the MEST Incubator program provide training, investment and mentoring for aspiring technology entrepreneurs with the goal of creating globally successful companies that create wealth and jobs locally πin Africa.
